ResearchProjectDef.label: Neolithic Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: The primal butchering for organs, often used in rituals. However quite barbaric. You can perform basic Blueprint through the butchering table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medieval Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: Skilled medical skills allows for humane organ extraction. People won't be disgusted by it. This research unlocks the Blueprint table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the right tools, training and technology, you can perserve human organs with the same success chance as in the core planets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spacer Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the right tools, training and technology, you can perserve human organs with the same success chance as in the core planets.
